name: Seasonals
description: Adds seasonal effects like snow, leaves, etc. to the Jellyfin web interface.

versions.changelog:
Features & Improvements
Theme Initialization: Enhanced the initialization process by loading configuration and improving event handling.
Script Injection:
- Enhanced script injection logic to include fallback registration via the File Transformation plugin.
- Improved error handling during the injection process.
- Updated warning messages to clearly clarify the fallback behavior when script injection fails.
- Add warning logs for permission issues during script injection and removal
